Room.Name: Secret Quick Car Transporter
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the quick car station for the town of Brownhaven.
Room.LongDescription: The quick cars are a fast and efficient mode of transportation between different places in the mountains and valleys. The elves of Caledonia created these cars and passages to travel great distances in minimal amounts of time. Brownhaven is about as far west as these cars go. At one point, the elves held a fascination with the humans, but decided that their basic nature was too violent to peacefully coexist together.
